member.name: NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT
member.summary: The NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT enumeration specifies the format of a network address returned by the function.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT.NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT_UNSPECIFIED
member.summary: The format of the network address is unspecified.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT.NET_ADDRESS_DNS_NAME
member.summary: The format of the network address is a DNS name.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT.NET_ADDRESS_IPV4
member.summary: The format of the network address is a string in Internet standard dotted-decimal notation for IPv4.

member.name: NET_ADDRESS_FORMAT.NET_ADDRESS_IPV6
member.summary: The format of the network address is a string in Internet standard hexadecimal encoding for IPv6.
